# terradactyl <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="120" />

<!-- badges: start -->
[![DOI](https://zenodo.org/badge/108332745.svg)](https://zenodo.org/badge/latestdoi/108332745)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of terradactyl is to provide tools for tidying rangeland core methods monitoring data and to produce standard indicators from those data. 

## Installation

``` r
devtools::install_github('Landscape-Data-Commons/terradactyl')
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(terradactyl)
## basic example code
```
